scripts.build: echo [1/8] Starting build process at %time%... && if exist dist (echo [2/8] Removing existing dist directory... && rmdir /s /q dist && if errorlevel 1 (echo Error: Failed to remove dist directory && exit /b 1)) else (echo [2/8] No existing dist directory to remove) && echo [3/8] Building client assets... && pnpm build:client && if errorlevel 1 (echo Error: pnpm build:client failed && exit /b 1) && if not exist dist (echo [4/8] Creating dist directory... && mkdir dist) else (echo [4/8] dist directory already exists) && if exist public\_redirects (echo [5/8] Copying redirects file... && copy public\_redirects dist\) else (echo Error: public\_redirects not found && exit /b 1) && if exist package.json (echo [6/8] Copying package.json... && copy package.json dist\) else (echo Error: package.json not found && exit /b 1) && echo [7/8] Creating build flag... && type nul > dist\build.flag && echo [8/8] Build completed successfully at %time%!
